Translations.Text: Aur Allah Taalaa ney tumharay liye tumharay gharon mein sakoonat ki jagah bana di hai aur ussi ney tumharay liye chopayon ki khalon kay ghar bana diye hain jinhen tum halka phulka patay ho apney kooch kay din aur apney theharney kay din bhi aur unn ki oon aur rooâ€™on aur baalon say bhi uss ney boht say saman aur aik waqt muqarrara tak kay liye faeeday ki cheezen banaeen

Allah hi ney tumharay liye apni peda kerda cheezon mein say saye banaye hain aur ussi ney tumharay liye paharon mein ghaar banaye hain aur ussi ney tumharay liye kurtay banaye hain jo tumhen garmi say bachayen aur aisay kuraty bhi jo tumhen laraee kay waqt kaam aayen. Woh issi tarah apni poori poori nematen dey raha hai kay tum hukum bardaar bann jao
Phir bhi agar yeh mun moray rahen to aap per sirf khol ker tableegh ker dena hi hai
Yeh Allah ki nematen jantay pehchantay huye bhi unn kay munkie horahey hain bulkay inn mein say aksar na shukray hain
Aur jiss din hum her ummat mein say gawah khara keren gay phir kafiron ko na ijazat di jaye gi aur na unn say toba kerney ko kaha jayega
Aur jab yeh zalim azab dekh len gay phir na to unn say halka kiya jayega aur na woh dheel diye jayen gay

Aur jab mushrikeen apney sharikon ko dekh len gay to kahen gay aey humaray perwerdigar! Yehi humaray woh shareek hain jinhen hum tujhay chor ker pukara kertay thay pus woh unhen jawab den gay kay tum bilkul hi jhootay ho
Uss din woh sab (aajiz ho ker) Allah kay samney itaâ€™at ka iqrar paish keren gay aur jo bohtan bazi kiya kertay thay woh sab unn say gumm hojayega
